name: Swipe Out
description: Swipe Out is a multiplayer platform-shooter game that is made with Unreal Engine 4. The game consists of two teams; runners and defenders. While the Runners try to reach the end of the level with the moving platforms and obstacles, the Defenders try to block the runners with weapons with various fantastic powers. Two teams are positioned on different platforms; the Defending team's platform is positioned higher up to provide the advantage of perspective towards the Runners' stage.
